author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...COSME BEGINNING TO WEAKEN... ...EXPECTED TO BECOME POST-TROPICAL BY WEDNESDAY...
summary: ...COSME BEGINNING TO WEAKEN... ...EXPECTED TO BECOME POST-TROPICAL BY WEDNESDAY... As of 8:00 AM MST Tue Jun 10 the center of Cosme was located near 15.5, -114.6 with movement NW at 3 mph. The minimum central pressure was 996 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 65 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...COSME BEGINNING TO WEAKEN... ...EXPECTED TO BECOME POST-TROPICAL BY WEDNESDAY... As of 8:00 AM MST Tue Jun 10 the center of Cosme was located near 15.5, -114.6 with movement NW at 3 mph. The minimum central pressure was 996 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 65 mph.

title: Summary for Tropical Storm Cosme (EP3/EP032025)
